level.heading: Audible notification of expiration of useful life of carbon monoxide alarms.
level.text: * ยง 28-312.3. Audible notification of expiration of useful life of carbon monoxide alarms. All carbon monoxide alarms installed after the effective date of this article shall comply with UL 2034 and be of a type that emits an audible notification at the expiration of the useful life of such alarm. * NB Effective April 1, 2014
